name: CLAMS NFA Wrapper
description: Wraps the [NVIDIA NeMo Forced Aligner tool](https://docs.nvidia.com/nemo-framework/user-guide/latest/nemotoolkit/tools/nemo_forced_aligner.html) to temporally align transcribed text with its audio source.

input.description: Text content transcribed from audio input with no existing annotations.

output.description: Token from original text split on whitespace. `text` property stores the string value of the token. `start` and `end` properties indicate position of token in entire text. `document` property identifies source text document.
TimeFrame annotation representing the source audio segment corresponding to a given transcribed token, with `start` and `end` times given in milliseconds.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: NeMo ASR model to use. Choices: fc_hybrid, parakeet, conformer, fc_ctc. By default, the fc_hybrid model will be used.

parameters.name: pretty
parameters.description: The JSON body of the HTTP response will be re-formatted with 2-space indentation

parameters.name: runningTime
parameters.description: The running time of the app will be recorded in the view metadata

parameters.name: hwFetch
parameters.description: The hardware information (architecture, GPU and vRAM) will be recorded in the view metadata
